title: Champion mastery missing icon
body: Im a level 5 with shyvana and for some reason when i play her now in normal game i dont have the icon on load screen and dont have pop up icon in game when i press ctr 6 but when i look in my profile it shows me as level 5. Glitch??

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
